text: Zvirokwazvo, As-Safa neMarwah (makomo maviri ari kuMakkah) ndezvimwe zvezviratidzo zvaAllah. Nokudaro hachisi chitadzo kune uyo anoshanyira imba (yaAllah) kunoita Hajj kana Umrah, kunotenderera pakati pawo (As-Safa neMarwah). Uye ani-nani anozvipira nekuda kwake kuita chakanaka, zvirokwazvo Allah ndivo vanotenda, muzivi wezvose
